text: John Cooper Lawton (11 July 1946 â€“ 29 June 2021) was a British rock and blues singer. He was best known for his work with Lucifer's Friend, Uriah Heep and the Les Humphries Singers. Lawton died unexpectedly in Bulgaria on 29 June 2021, at the age of 74.Former Uriah Heep Singer John Lawton Dead at 74 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British rock singers Category:British singer-songwriters Category:British television presenters Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:Progressive rock singers
